# Question 1.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price))+
  geom_histogram(color = "brown", fill = "white")+
  facet_wrap(~cut)
```

# Question 2.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
diamonds
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price))+
  geom_histogram(color = "brown", fill = "white")+
  facet_wrap(~cut)+
  theme(plot.background = element_rect("grey"), axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"))
```
